scripts.asbuild:debug: asc assembly/index.ts --target debug --exportRuntime -b raw --enable simd --sharedMemory --exportMemory --maximumMemory 128 --enable threads
scripts.asbuild:release: asc assembly/index.ts -b raw --target release --exportRuntime --enable simd --enable threads --exportMemory --maximumMemory 128 --sharedMemory
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:debug && npm run asbuild:release
